Calnexin.Synonym: Calnexin precursor; IP90; Major histocompatibility complex class I antigen- binding protein p88; p90
Calnexin.Definition: Calnexin (CNX) is a 90kDa integral protein of the endoplasmic reticulum (ER). It consists of a large (50 kDa) N-terminal calcium-binding lumenal domain, a single transmembrane helix and a short (90 residues), acidic cytoplasmic tail.
